评论概述: This was super cute and fit really well, but I didn’t love the fabric.
评论详情: I originally ordered one in  another color with a pattern and loved it so much that I got black. However, this fabric is a little different. The black picked up every single piece of hair, lint dust, and anything else you can think of and held onto it like Velcro. I wound up just donating it. I loved the original one so much, that I actually ordered another patterned one. It is just as great as the first one. I guess the black one is just made out of a different material that’s not great. They wash really well too! I just hang them up to dry.
It didn't fit me because I sized up two sizes after reading the hysteria about how small it ran. FYI - Buy your regular size. I would have kept it had it fit.

I got this dress to wear during the summer months while heavily pregnant and it’s so comfortable! i wish it came in more colors. it will also be a great dress for after pregnancy. i’ve washed and dried it multiple times and its still in great condition

Comfy, flattering, true to size!
This dress fits just like described. It is very comfortable!

I really like this dress. It's my new favorite summer go-to.  It flows and doesn't cling to my stomach and waist. It has pockets which is always a plus. It has washed well however it has shrunk in length, which isn't a problem for me since I am short, but I also dried it on low heat which the tag advises against. I am not taking a star away for that since it was my fault it shrunk. I do wish the dress was a little cheaper in cost because I would definitely order more if it was.
